data.text: @stlouisfed The CCP has implemented a human ecocide program, sparrows have completely disappeared in some Chinese cities, pangolins have been commercially "extinct", bald dolphins have become extinct, and the extinction of animals and plants is irreversible
@stlouisfed 中共真對人類實施生態滅亡計劃，麻雀已經在中國一些城市完全消失，穿山甲已被商業性「滅絕」，高鼻羚羊滅絕，白鳍豚滅絕，动植物灭绝不可逆转。

@stlouisfed Screw u, you cowards. Tell your president to vote against the FOMC and get members on his side. Americans are suffering while the rich continue to benefit from higher asset prices, higher housing price and higher rent prices. Jerome Powell only serves his HF & PE friends
